p: Administration of A. cepa aqueous extract (0.1 mL/100 g bw, oral) for 7 weeks to female BALB/c mice with breast cancer, caused reductions in IL-4 and increases in IFN-γ level and IFN-γ/IL4 ratio (Th 1/Th 2 balance) indicating stimulatory effects of A. cepa on Th 1 but inhibitory effects on Th 2 activity (Karishchi and Bidaran 2018).
